introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Monopoly is a unique game developed by IDNLIVE. This game is similar to the widely known Monopoly game, but in this version, we replace it with 16 countries as the stakes and include 4 special zones.

rules.title: Rules
steps: The game begins when the dealer opens the betting period.
You must place your bets on the provided betting panel.
Special zones are not included in any bets on the betting panel.
After the betting period ends, the dealer will roll a 20-sided die numbered 1-20 to determine the number of steps taken.
Once the number is obtained, the system will determine the game period result based on the number.
If the die does not stop perfectly and the number is unclear, a 'no game' status will occur, and the dealer will roll the die again until a clear result is achieved.
There are 20 boxes divided into 5 zones, each with its own color.
Special zones are not included in any bets.
rules.note: For 50:50 bets (8-country bets), if the result is one of the special zones, the chips will be returned.

special-description.x1/2: All bets pay half of the wager.
special-description.x1: All bets pay one time the wager.
special-description.x2: All bets pay two times the wager.
special-description.zonk: All bets will lose except for 50:50 bets.
